column1: I hope you will join me in prayer tomorrow during the National Day of Prayer. Let's especially lift up those who are suffering from COVID-19 and those who are heroically serving on the front lines of the battle against this pandemic. #NationalDayOfPrayer https://t.co/f87Yt57NIS

How are you creating social distance today to help slow the spread of coronavirus?    It's important for everyone to do our small part by limiting our non-essential travel and personal contacts right now.  I hope you'll stay safe and be smart today.  #TogetherApart  #NCBoots
